alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oxford, west central Androscoggin and northern Cumberland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 608 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waterford, or 11 miles northeast of Bridgton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Mechanic Falls, Turner, Waterford, Harrison, Buckfield, Hebron, Hartford, Greenwood, West Paris, Norway, Sumner, Minot, Oxford, Paris, Woodstock, Albany, Peru and Otisfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
